column2: Unit 1: Challenges to European Dominance, 1910s - 1942
After World War I: Aims and Terms of the Paris Peace Conference and its Immediate Impact on Europe in the 1920s
Assess the impact of post-war peace settlements on Europe
Assess the attempts at collective security in the 1920s and its outcomes
Overview of the Attempts at Establishing Viable Political Systems after World War
Demonstrate awareness of political developments after World War I
Case Study of Nazi Germany: Rise of Authoritarian Regimes
Examine the rise of authoritarian regimes and evaluate their impact on the political, social and economic context of Germany
Evaluate the roles of key players in the establishment of authoritarian rule in Germany
Case Study of Militarist Japan, 1920s - 1930s: Rise of Authoritarian Regimes
Examine the rise of authoritarian regimes and evaluate their impact on the political, social and economic context of Japan
Evaluate the roles of key players in the establishment of authoritarian rule in Japan
Key Developments Leading to the Outbreak of World War II in Europe
Evaluate the reasons for the outbreak of World War II in Europe
Evaluate the roles played by individuals and groups in developments leading to the outbreak of World War II in Europe
Key Developments Leading to the Outbreak of World War II in Asia-Pacific
Evaluate the reasons for the outbreak of World War II in the Asia-Pacific
Evaluate the roles played by individuals and groups in developments leading to the outbreak of World War II in the Asia-Pacific
Unit 2: Developments in the Post World War II World: The Cold War, 1940s - 1991
Reasons for the End of World War II
Assess the reasons for the end of World War II
Origins and Development of the Cold War in Europe
Assess the immediate impact of World War II on Europe
Examine how Cold War tensions are manifested in Europe
Assess the impact of rivalry between the USA and USSR in the aftermath of World War II
Extension of the Cold War outside Europe: Case Study of Korean War, 1950 - 1953
Assess the impact of the emergence of communist China on Cold War tensions
Assess the reasons for the outbreak of the Korean War, and its aftermath
Evaluate the extent and impact of superpowers involvement in civil wars with reference to the Korean War
Examine the immediate aftermath of the Korean War on Cold War developments
Extension of the Cold War outside Europe: Case Study of Vietnam War, 1954 -1975
Assess the reasons for the outbreak of the Vietnam War, and its aftermath
Evaluate the extent and impact of superpowers involvement in civil wars with reference to the Vietnam War
Examine the immediate aftermath of the Vietnam War on Cold War developments
